ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentFlexibleTicketDialog
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module for your own ticket dialogs.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###212-FlexibleTicketDialog
ConfigItem.Description: shows links to all your own ticket dialogs in the ticket menu.

ConfigItem.Name: FlexibleTicketModule::Menu###001-Customer-Vistit-Us
ConfigItem.Description: Customer visited us at the office

Hash.Item: use this when the customer has visited us at the office

ConfigItem.Name: FlexibleTicketModule::Menu###002-We-Visit-Customer
ConfigItem.Description: We visted the customer.

Hash.Item: Use this when you have visted the customer on site

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###DialogTitle
ConfigItem.Description: Prefix for the title.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: When using visit this needs to be added to System::Permission

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###RequiredLock
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###ArticleType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default type of the note in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###SenderType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default sender type for phone tickets in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###Subject
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default subject for phone tickets in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###Body
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default note body text for phone tickets in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###State
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default ticket next state after adding a phone note in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###StateType
ConfigItem.Description: Next possible ticket states after adding a phone note in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###HistoryType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history type for the ticket phone inbound screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::Customer-Vistit-Us###HistoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history comment for the ticket phone inbound screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

Setting.String: Customer has visted Agent (at his location)

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###DialogTitle
ConfigItem.Description: Prefix for the title.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the ticket phone inbound screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###RequiredLock
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###ArticleType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default type of the note in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###SenderType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default sender type for phone tickets in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###Subject
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default subject for phone tickets in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###Body
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default note body text for phone tickets in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###State
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default ticket next state after adding a phone note in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###StateType
ConfigItem.Description: Next possible ticket states after adding a phone note in the ticket phone inbound screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###HistoryType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history type for the ticket phone inbound screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::FlexibleTicketDialog::We-Visit-Customer###HistoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history comment for the ticket phone inbound screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

Setting.String: Agent has visted Customer on site
